channel.title: Help on Tinkle
channel.description: Recent content in Help on Tinkle

item.title: How to quit Tinkle
item.description: Tinkle keeps running in the background even if you close Settings. To quit Tinkle, choose “Quit Tinkle” from menu bar. Note If you’ve hidden the menu bar icon, you can also quit Tinkle from Settings. Open Settings. Press Quit Tinkle button.

item.title: How to uninstall Tinkle
item.description: Remove Tinkle from your system as follows. Quit Tinkle before uninstallaion. Open Applications folder in Finder, then move Tinkle to trash.

item.title: Downgrade to older version
item.description: Download an older version from Release notes and install it.

item.title: Use beta version
item.description: You can install beta version from Check for beta updates button on Misc tab.
